A wave of murders is sweeping the underworld of San Francisco. One by one, the crime bosses, their power and influence thought to be out of danger are being eliminated coldly. The kind of justice that Detective Harry Callahan approve. In ".44 Magnum" Dirty Harry deals with the worst kind of criminals that get literally rid the city of scum that courts of justice can not touch, unfortunately for them, their methods go against the system that Callahan sworn to protect. Written by John DeMillus and Michael Cimino, this electrifying film shows the star Clint Eastwood more ruthless than ever, ruthlessly pursuing the enemies of law.
